Posts.Content: i HAD BEEN RECEIVING NEULASTRA DAY AFTER MY CHEMO (A/C) . FELT GOOD UNTIL DAY AFTER SHOT. AFTER 3RD ROUND OF A/C AND THIRD SHOT OF NEULASTRA ENDENDED UP IN ER. HAD LABS DONE WHILE THERE AND FOUND MY WHITE COUNT WET UP TP 1003 !!!!!!!!!!!! DOCTOR COULD NOT EXPLAIN AS THEY HAVE NEVER SEEN IT GO SO HIGH. CHECKED WITH MANUFACTURER AND THEY DID NT HAVE ANY RECORD OF THIS HAPPENING. THIS WOULD HAVE GONE UNNOTICED HAD I NOT GONE TO ER AND HAD LABS, AS I DONT GET LABS DONE UNTIL DAY BEFORE TREATMENT HAS ANYONE HAD THIS PROBLEM WITH NEULASTRA??? i WILL NOW RECIEVE NEUPOGEN BEGINNIG DAY 3 AND HAVE IT EVERYDAY. THEY SAY I CAN ADMINISTER IT AT HOME IF I FEEL LIKE I CAN HANDLE IT. HAS ANYONE DONE THIS AND HOW ARE YOU AFFECTED BY THE NEULASTRA? THANKS , KAREN
Posts.Title: Neupogen question
